entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning before morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain. Low minus 2.
